titleStmt.title: Ordinances decreed for reformation of diuers disorders in printing and vttering of bookes
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Privy Council.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.)
"At the Starre Chamber the xxix. daie of Iune. Anno. 1566. and the viij yeere of the Queenes Maiesties reigne."
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
